*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Austin, January 12, 1825. Land business. Trade. Economic conditions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-12-1825">12 January 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I left *person_mentioned*Mr Sims*/person_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*Saint Antonio Road*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-11-1825">yesterday */date_mentioned*he sends you the Notes of my Hacienda and the notes of *location_mentioned*Gates Tract*/location_mentioned* the Body of my Survey is in the *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*and all you want is to connect the oblong or arm that includes the *location_mentioned*Mill Seat*/location_mentioned* — I know nothing about old *person_mentioned*Furnash*/person_mentioned*s Improvement I did not know that he had an Improvement of corse agreeable to your Directions *person_mentioned*Sims*/person_mentioned* split *location_mentioned*the Two Leagues Between *person_mentioned*Furnash*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Lynch*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*Byrd*/person_mentioned* or who Ever it may fall to furnash is on the *location_mentioned*Lower Hall adjoining my line*/location_mentioned* I dont know How to arrange it with him nor what he wants other than the arrangement allready made I dislike the Trouble of going to see him and having the surveys all altered again However I will doo any ways you wish in order to get it done *person_mentioned*Sims*/person_mentioned* is going on Rapidly now and will be down with me when I come down which will be in a few days I must go to see furnash before I come down and make some arrangement with him *person_mentioned*Sims*/person_mentioned* has taken a *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*she is a very fine Looking woman and all Tolld that I know I cant get any pork for you in this part of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*tel *person_mentioned*Mr Stafford*/person_mentioned* that I can get One Hundred Bushels of corn for him from the *person_mentioned*Milicans*/person_mentioned* at the*location_mentioned* ten mile creek*/location_mentioned* no other com can be had in this part of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*I cannot get any pork for him and if he intends to take the corn from the *person_mentioned*Milicans*/person_mentioned* he must let me know immediately */p* *p**person_mentioned*Coles*/person_mentioned* [Rubric] */p* [Addressed:] *person_mentioned*S F Austin Political chief and Judge*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*Colony San F De Austin*/location_mentioned*.
*/div1*
